properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 6 at 8:17AM PST until February 7 at 12:03PM PST by NWS Pendleton OR
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Pendleton has issued a flood
warning for the following rivers in Oregon...

Umatilla River at Pendleton affecting Umatilla County

The National Weather Service in Pendleton has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Umatilla River at Pendleton.
* from this morning to Friday afternoon...or until the warning is
cancelled.
* At 8:00 AM Thursday, the stage was 9.9 feet.
* Flood stage is 12.3 feet.
* Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by late this morning and continue
to rise to near 14.4 feet by late this afternoon. The river will
fall below flood stage by tomorrow morning. This will cause
flooding in the Riverside area of Pendleton as well as low areas
from Reith downstream to Echo.
properties.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown. Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility
vehicles through flooded areas. The water may be too deep to allow
for safe passage. As little as one foot of water on the road can move
most vehicles off the road.
